mapper.select:
select b.* from (select rownum rn, a.* from (select * from market
where mkt_ctg=#{mktCtg}
) a
WHERE rownum <= #{page} * 9) b WHERE b.rn > (#{page}-1) * 9
order by board_no desc
order by price
order by price desc
mapper.insert:
select 'MKT' || LPAD(bnb_seq.nextval, 6, '0') from dual
insert into market( board_no, MEM_NO, MKT_CTG, TITLE, PRICE, QTY, REP, DETA_DESCT) values(#{boardNo}, #{memNo}, #{mktCtg}, #{title}, #{price}, #{qty}, #{rep}, #{detaDesct} )
